member.name: T:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection
member.summary: Prevents all death of its target creature while active. Can be configured to either expire after a given delay, or once a given condition is met.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.TrueCondition
member.summary: The positive condition for removing the protection instance; Always returns true.
member.remarks: When using this predicate, the protection instance is removed as soon as lifetime is depleted.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.FalseCondition
member.summary: The negative condition for removing the protection instance; Always returns false.
member.remarks: When using this predicate, the protection instance remains indefinitely active until manually removed.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.SafeLandingCondition
member.summary: The default condition for removing the protection instance; Returns true when the target is in a safe position.
member.remarks: When using this predicate, the protection is removed as soon as the target is conscious and on solid ground or a body of water.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.Target
member.summary: The targeted creature.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionModes
member.summary: The sources of damage this protection will prevent against for its Target.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectAgainstViolence
member.summary: Determines if the current protection will prevent creature-sourced damage or death attempts. This value is equivalent to ProtectionModes.HasFlag(DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.Violence).

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectAgainstEnvironment
member.summary: Determines if the current protection will prevent environmental damage or death causes. This value is equivalent to ProtectionModes.HasFlag(DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.Environment).

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectAgainstDestruction
member.summary: Determines if the current protection will prevent all kinds of destruction, be it creature or environment-sourced. This value is equivalent to ProtectionModes.HasFlag(DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.Destruction).

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.SafePos
member.summary: The last known position considered "safe"; If the protected creature is destroyed, it is instead teleported to this position.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.Power
member.summary: The power value for visual effects.

member.name: P:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.SaveCooldown
member.summary: If greater than 0, a cooldown where the creature is assumed to be alive; Prevents repeated attempts to revive the target causing no revival at all.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.lifespan
member.summary: An optional lifespan for the protection. If a condition is also provided, this acts as the "grace" timer before the protection can actually expire.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.revivalsLeft
member.summary: The amount of times the protection will attempt to revive its target creature. If this number reaches zero, the protection is destroyed.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.condition
member.summary: An optional condition to determine when the protection should be removed. If omitted, defaults to a countdown using lifespan.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.forceRevive
member.summary: If true and Target somehow dies while under this protection, it is instead revived.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.isWaterBreathingCrit
member.summary: If true, deep bodies of water are considered as "safe positions" for returning Target in case of destruction.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.safeChunkIndex
member.summary: The BodyChunk to use as reference for setting and retrieving the target creature's "safe position".

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.originalImmunities
member.summary: The natural immunities Target had prior to being protected, in the following order: Hypothermia, Lava, Tentacle. When the protection is removed, their respective fields are restored to their original values.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.#ctor(Creature,System.Predicate{Creature},System.Int32,ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode,System.Nullable{WorldCoordinate},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new death protection instance which lasts until the given condition returns true.
member.param: The condition for removing the protection; When true, the protection is removed.
The amount of time to wait before can be tested.
An optional "safe" position, used when the creature is destroyed.
If true and somehow dies while protected, it is revived. This also immediately ends the protection.

member.param: An optional "safe" position, used when the creature is destroyed.
If true and somehow dies while protected, it is revived. This also immediately ends the protection.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.HasProtection(Creature)
member.summary: Determines if a given creature is being protected from death.
member.returns: true if the given creature is being protected from death, false otherwise.

member.name: M:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.TryGetProtection(Creature,ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection@)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve the instance of a given creature, if any.
member.param: The retrieved protection instance. If none is found, this value is null.
member.returns: true if a valid protection instance was found, false otherwise.

member.name: T:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode
member.summary: Determines what kind of death sources will protect its target against.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.None
member.summary: No source will be prevented; This is the same as having no death protection at all.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.Violence
member.summary: Creature-related violence (e.g. lizard bites, all weapons, etc.) will be ignored; The target cannot be grabbed by creatures, and becomes immune to Bite and Explosion damage.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.Environment
F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.GenericImmunity
member.summary: Combines the protection values of and ; Has a similar behavior to the `invuln` command from the Dev Console mod. This is a composite protection type.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.Destruction
member.summary: Protects the target against all forms of destruction (death pits, tesla coils, worm grass, vultures flying off-screen, etc.); If destroyed, the target will reappear at the last "safe" position it was at, briefly knocking away nearby creatures.

member.name: F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.NonEnvironmental
F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.NonCreature
F:ModLib.Objects.DeathProtection.ProtectionMode.FullInvulnerability
member.summary: Combines all three protection types: , , and ; Prevents all forms of death and destruction from killing the target. Unless by exceptional cases or mod intervention, the target cannot die or be destroyed by any means. This is a composite protection type.
